name: 4 Wheel Power Drive
description:
This is an unforgiving competition where only the strongest and the most skilled survive. Join the arena and drive your 4 wheel car , crashing into the others and destroying their cars, before they get the chance to destroy yours. Pick up power ups that will help you, buy upgrades and repair your 4 wheel car between levels and try to complete them all, so you can be the last one standing.

* Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
* Crazy Addictive Experience.
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Animations And Physics
